adHeader: The Writing Friend: For All Your Writing/Editing Needs
adDetails: The Writing Friend is the most comprehensive solution to your writing, revisions and academic needs. I can accomplish these tasks: * write/edit papers, essays, dissertations, lab reports, etc. (undergrad and grad-level work) * do/edit homework assignments (any grade/degree level) * do online coursework (perfect for online college students who also have to work and do not have time for their studies) * Resume writer/editor (I create cover letters too) *Write/edit college admissions essays, personal statements, letters of recommendation, etc. * Ghostwriter/proofreader/copy editor *And much, much more! Remember not to procrastinate. The spring semester is here and your workload is increasing. All deadlines are accommodated. Privacy & discretion are guaranteed. Email or call show contact info for a FREE quote and consultation today!
